lead_paragraph: An aerial refueling tanker and two long-range surveillance aircraft will remain part of the military mission.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Canada: Trudeau Pulls Combat Jets From Syria, but Keeps Other Aircraft
headline.main: Canada: Trudeau Pulls Combat Jets From Syria, but Keeps Other Aircraft

snippet: An aerial refueling tanker and two long-range surveillance aircraft will remain part of the military mission.
abstract: Canadian Prime Min Justin Trudeau says country will withdraw six fighter jets that are part of American-led military coalition against Islamic State, fulfilling one of his campaign promises; aerial refueling tanker and two surveillance aircraft will continue to participate in coalition.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
